content.rendered:
Our Lash extensions are non Damage and better retention system

DEAR : FIRST TIME CLIENTS !!

Thank you for visiting Lucia Lash and Brow stamford CT! Lucia Lash and Brow’s main goal is to help stamford clients achieve their desired eyebrow and eyelash designs, by using carefully selected products that will aid in maintaining the strength of brow and lash hairs to keep them in the healthiest state possible .

By conducting thorough consultations before every appointment, we make sure to get as much information as possible to make your lash and brow goals a reality!

ABOUT US

We have been open Lash business in NY since October 2015. We serve customers in the Stamford neighborhoods of the New York area and are also very conveniently located for people who live and work in Fairfield and Westchester Counties. Many of our guests attend or work at UCONN, Stamford Hospital, Greenwich Hospital, Norwalk Hospital, White Plains Hospital, and Westchester Medical. We proudly serve the women in the local community.

BOOK APPOINTMENT NOW

WHY CHOOSE US

Lucia Lash use “Hand made fan lashes”.  

Hand Made
Fans

  • Better retention
  • Feel soft
  • non-damage

Other salon’s Pre-made fans

  • fall off easily
  • feel heavy
  • Damage
BOOK APPOINTMENT NOW

Our Hand-Made Fan lashes

If created correctly, these fans have the perfect amount of adhesive and will not be too heavy or damaging to the natural lash. They also “wrap” around a natural lash to create the best bond between the fan and natural lash, helping increase the retention time. It also creates a smoother “wrap around” affect that looks good and doesn’t catch while brushing your lashes.

Other salons’s Pre-made Fans
(Not our salon🙅‍♀️)

on the other hand, don’t provide as much flexibility to adapt to different lash textures, lengths, or strengths. Additionally, the artist doesn’t have control over the amount of adhesive already on the fan, meaning there may be added weight due to having to dip the volume fan a second time. Without careful calibration on the part of the artist, the result could be a higher likelihood of lashes falling out due to a weak bond.

we use Keratin based Lash extension Glue

WHY KERATIN BLENDED GLUE?

The reason is because the eyelashes themselves do not have the same self-repairing function as the nails.

There is considerable friction when applying mascara. when you removing Mascara. This friction can damage your eyelashes.

Women in the world think that they cannot do cause any damage because they don’t have extensions or eyelash perms, but in fact, they do it without knowing it.

First of all, Mascara

There is considerable friction when applying mascara. when you removing Mascara. This friction can damage your eyelashes.

Even though cosmetics companies sell mascara, they don’t care about the health of your lashes at all. And most consumers themselves are unaware of this damage! That can be caused when removing mascara!

Your eyelashes needs to be treated and repaired from normal wear and tear just like the hair ok your head, with or without extensions.

Working women, mothers raising children, and girls busy studying as students,

I would like to propose to such busy women at this time!

Most of our NY and Philadelphia clients are working women or moms.

They are super happy with lash retention and save their time

Keratin Glue has better retension!

Don’y worry if you work out a lot!

Whould you like to try our Healthy Lash & Brow Services?

See Lash services and designs
Brow Services and designs
Make Appointment

WHAT OUR CLIENT SAYS

Our expert stylists will help you select the style best suited for your eye shape, and desired look, even taking into consideration your lifestyle to ensure your best lash look.

BOOK YOUR APPOINTMENT TODAY!
